abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
abilities.rule:
In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next turn, its Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret weapon.

***Designer’s Note**: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.*

abilities.name: Breach and Clear
abilities.rule: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

wargear_options:
■ The Breacher Fire Warrior Shas’ui can be equipped with up to two of the following, and can take duplicates:
◦ 1 guardian drone (it cannot take duplicates of this piece of wargear)
◦ 1 gun drone
◦ 1 marker drone
◦ 1 shield drone
unit_composition:

■ **9 Breacher Fire Warriors**

**Every model is equipped with:** pulse blaster; pulse pistol; close combat weapon.
